instructions.reason_for_call: You live on Elm Avenue in Houston, and recently you moved to a new house on the same street and bought a luggage set sent to this new address. But you realize you have another order sent to the old address, and you want to change your wrong order address to the new home, and also your user default address to the new home. You do not want to reveal your address but the agent should be able to look it up in orders You do not want to reveal your address and insist the agent should be able to look it up in orders. You also want to exchange your tablet to the cheapest one due to moving costs.
instructions.known_info: You name is Sophia Martin and your email is sophia.martin4832@example.com.
instructions.task_instructions: You are organized and outgoing.  Make sure to mention the two address changes then the exchange.

nl_assertions: Agent should make changes to address on order and user profile
Agent should modify the pending order.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I recently moved to a new house on Elm Avenue in Houston, and I have a couple of things I need help with. I ordered a luggage set to my new address, but I realized I have another order that was sent to my old address on the same street. I want to change the delivery address for that order to my new home. Also, I want to update my user default address to the new home as well. I prefer not to share my address details directly, but you should be able to look it up from my orders. Additionally, I want to exchange a tablet I ordered for the cheapest one available due to moving costs. Can you assist me with these requests?

message.content: Hello! I recently moved to a new house on Elm Avenue in Houston, and I have a couple of things I need help with. I ordered a luggage set to my new address, but I realized I have another order that was sent to my old address on the same street. I want to change the delivery address for that order to my new home. Also, I want to update my user default address to the new home as well. I prefer not to share my address details directly, but you should be able to look it up from my orders. Additionally, I want to exchange a tablet I ordered for the cheapest one available due to moving costs. Can you assist me with these requests?
